thread.title: The pancreas can be triggered to regenerate itself through a type of fasting diet, say US researchers. Restoring the function of the organ - which helps control blood sugar levels - reversed symptoms of diabetes in animal experiments.
thread.title_full: The pancreas can be triggered to regenerate itself through a type of fasting diet, say US researchers. Restoring the function of the organ - which helps control blood sugar levels - reversed symptoms of diabetes in animal experiments.

author: /u/NinjaDiscoJesus
title: The pancreas can be triggered to regenerate itself through a type of fasting diet, say US researchers. Restoring the function of the organ - which helps control blood sugar levels - reversed symptoms of diabetes in animal experiments.
text: Directly link to published peer-reviewed research articles or a brief media summary No summaries of summaries, reviews or popular reposts (over 100 upvotes) Research must be less than 6 months old No sensationalized titles, all titles must include the model where applicable No blogspam, images, videos, infographics All submissions must be flaired and contain a link to the published article, either in the submission link or as a standalone comment.
